lombok.maven
Class AbstractDelombokMojo

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      lombok.maven.AbstractDelombokMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContextEnabled, Mojo
Direct Known Subclasses:
DelombokMojo, TestDelombokMojo
public abstract class AbstractDelombokMojo
extends AbstractMojo

Abstract mojo to Delombok java source with lombok annotations.

Author:
Anthony Whitford
See Also:
Delombok
Mojo is thread safe:
true

Field Detail

skip

protected boolean skip
Specifies whether the delombok generation should be skipped.

Is defined by:
expression:
${lombok.delombok.skip}
default-value:
false
Is required.

encoding

protected String encoding
Encoding.

Is defined by:
expression:
${lombok.encoding}
default-value:
${project.build.sourceEncoding}
Is required.

verbose

protected boolean verbose
Verbose flag. Print the name of each file as it is being delombok-ed.

Is defined by:
expression:
${lombok.verbose}
default-value:
false
Is required.
